member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessage
member.summary: Defines a message received from the message bus, including the message body and a set of properties a associated with the message.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessage.Message
member.summary: Gets the message body.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessage.Properties
member.summary: Gets the properties associated with the message, including custom properties defined by the application that sent it to the message bus.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusManagementService
member.summary: Defines the message bus management service, which allows managing (creating, deleting, etc.) the entities (queues, topics, subscriptions, and subscription rules) used by the message bus ().
member.remarks: Depending on the concrete implementation of in use, it may require these entities to be created before being used.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusManagementService.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the service.

member.summary: Creates the specified topic.
member.param: The name of the topic that should be created.
An optional delegate to configure the topic options.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Creates the specified topic if it does not exist.
member.param: The name of the topic that should be created.
An optional delegate to configure the topic options.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. A value indicating whether the topic was created.

member.summary: Creates the specified topic subscription rule.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusManagementServiceFactory
member.summary: Defines the message bus management service factory, which allows resolving named instances.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusManagementServiceFactory.GetService(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the service previously registered with the specified name.
member.returns: The instance.
member.exception: Raised if the specified named service was not previously registered.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusManagementServiceFactory.GetServiceOrDefault(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the service previously registered with the specified name or the default service if no service with that name has been registered.
member.returns: The instance.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusService
member.summary: Defines the message bus service. The message bus provides a message broker with support for message queues and publish-subscribe topics.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusService.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the service.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusService.CreateTopicPublisher(System.String,System.Action{Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.TopicPublisherOptions})
member.summary: Creates a publisher for the specified topic in the message bus. The publisher allows sending messages to the specified message bus topic.
member.param: An optional delegate to configure the publisher options.
member.returns: The instance.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusService.CreateTopicReceiver(System.String,System.String,System.Action{Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.TopicReceiverOptions})
member.summary: Creates a receiver for the specified topic subscription in the message bus. The receiver allows retrieving messages from the specified message bus topic subscription.
member.param: An optional delegate to configure the receiver options.
member.returns: The instance.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusService.CreateTopicSubscriber(System.String,System.String,System.Action{Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.TopicSubscriberOptions})
member.summary: Creates a subscriber for the specified subscription in the message bus. The subscriber allows retrieving messages from the specified message bus topic subscription by registering a processing handler that will be invoked every time a message is available.
member.param: An optional delegate to configure the subscriber options.
member.returns: The instance.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusService.CreateQueuePublisher(System.String,System.Action{Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueuePublisherOptions})
member.summary: Creates a publisher for the specified queue in the message bus. The publisher allows sending messages to the specified message bus queue.
member.param: An optional delegate to configure the publisher options.
member.returns: The instance.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusService.CreateQueueReceiver(System.String,System.Action{Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueReceiverOptions})
member.summary: Creates a receiver for the specified queue in the message bus. The receiver allows retrieving messages from the specified message bus queue.
member.param: An optional delegate to configure the receiver options.
member.returns: The instance.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusService.CreateQueueSubscriber(System.String,System.Action{Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueSubscriberOptions})
member.summary: Creates a subscriber for the specified queue in the message bus. The subscriber allows retrieving messages from the specified message bus queue by registering a processing handler that will be invoked every time a message is available.
member.param: An optional delegate to configure the subscriber options.
member.returns: The instance.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusServiceFactory
member.summary: Defines the message bus service factory, which allows resolving named instances.

member.summary: Retrieves the service previously registered with the specified name.
member.returns: The instance.
member.exception: Raised if the specified named service was not previously registered.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageBusServiceFactory.GetServiceOrDefault(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the service previously registered with the specified name or the default service if no service with that name has been registered.
member.returns: The instance.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties
member.summary: Defines a set of common properties of a message conveyed by the message bus.
member.remarks: This type allows storing also custom application properties.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.Id
member.summary: Gets the message identifier.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.TimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the message time to live (TTL).
member.remarks: This value is the relative duration after which the message expires. When not set explicitly, the assumed value is the default time to live for the respective queue or topic.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.PartitionKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the partition key that should be used to send the message to a partitioned entity.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.CorrelationId
member.summary: Gets or sets the correlation identifier.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.Subject
member.summary: Gets or sets the subject.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.To
member.summary: Gets or sets the to address.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.ContentType
member.summary: Gets or sets the message content type.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.ReplyTo
member.summary: Gets or sets the reply-to address.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.DeadLetterSource
member.summary: Gets the message dead-letter source (the queue and/or subscription from where the message was received).

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.DeadLetterErrorDescription
member.summary: Gets the message dead-letter error description.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.DeadLetterReason
member.summary: Gets the message dead-letter reason.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.State
member.summary: Gets the state of the message.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.ExpiresAt
member.summary: Gets the date and time in UTC at which the message is set to expire.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.EnqueuedTime
member.summary: Gets the date and time in UTC at which the message was enqueued.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.SequenceNumber
member.summary: Gets the message sequence number.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.DeliveryCount
member.summary: Gets the current delivery count.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IMessageProperties.LockToken
member.summary: Gets the message lock token.
member.remarks: This lock is used to explicitly settle the message.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessIncomingMessageEventArgs
member.summary: Defines the interface of an event handler from processing incoming messages.
member.remarks: This handler is used by and to receive incoming messages.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessIncomingMessageEventArgs.Message
member.summary: Gets the message received.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessIncomingMessageEventArgs.CancellationToken
member.summary: Gets the cancellation token that will be canceled if is called.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessIncomingMessageEventArgs.AbandonMessageAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Abandons the incoming message, making it available again for processing.
member.param: A dictionary containing the message properties that should be modified while abandoning it.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessIncomingMessageEventArgs.CompleteMessageAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Completes the incoming message and deletes it from the message bus.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessIncomingMessageEventArgs.DeadLetterMessageAsync(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Moves the incoming message to the dead-letter queue.
member.param: A dictionary containing the message properties that should be modified while moving it.
The reason for dead-lettering the message.
The error description for dead-lettering the message.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessIncomingMessageEventArgs.RenewMessageLockAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Renews the lock on the incoming message.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessUnhandledErrorEventArgs
member.summary: Defines the interface of an event handler from processing unhandled exceptions while a subscriber is processing incoming messages.
member.remarks: This handler is used by and to receive incoming messages.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessUnhandledErrorEventArgs.Exception
member.summary: Gets the exception that triggered the call to the handler.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessUnhandledErrorEventArgs.ErrorSource
member.summary: Gets the source associated with the error.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessUnhandledErrorEventArgs.Identifier
member.summary: Gets the identifier of the subscriber that raised the error.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IProcessUnhandledErrorEventArgs.CancellationToken
member.summary: Gets the cancellation token that will be canceled if is called.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IReceiver
member.summary: Defines a receiver. A receiver is capable of receiving messages from a specific queue or topic in the message bus.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IReceiver.PeekMessageAsync(System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Fetches the next available message from the message bus without changing its state.
member.param: An optional sequence number from where to peek the message.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The message. Null if no message is available.
member.remarks: A peeked message, unlike a received message, cannot be completed/abandoned/deferred/dead-lettered/renewed.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IReceiver.PeekMessagesAsync(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int64},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Fetches the next available messages from the message bus without changing their state.
member.param: The maximum number of messages to return.
An optional sequence number from where to peek the message.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. A list containing the messages fetched.
member.remarks: A peeked message, unlike a received message, cannot be completed/abandoned/deferred/dead-lettered/renewed.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IReceiver.ReceiveMessageAsync(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Receives the next available message from the message bus.
member.param: A optional specifying the maximum time to wait for a message.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The message. Null if no message is available.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.IReceiver.ReceiveMessagesAsync(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Receives the next available messages from the message bus.
member.param: The maximum number of messages to return.
A optional specifying the maximum time to wait for a message.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. A list containing the messages received.

member.summary: Completes the specified message and deletes it from the message bus.
member.param: The message that should be completed.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.param: The message that should be abandoned.
A dictionary containing the message properties that should be modified while abandoning it.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.ISubscriber
member.summary: Defines a subscriber. A subscriber is capable of subscribing to a specific queue or topic in the message bus and process the incoming messages.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.ISubscriber.IsStarted
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the subscriber is processing messages.

member.name: E:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.ISubscriber.ProcessMessageAsync
member.summary: The handler that is responsible for processing incoming messages. This handler will be automatically invoked when a new message becomes available in the message bus.

member.name: E:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.ISubscriber.ProcessErrorAsync
member.summary: The handler that is responsible for processing unhandled exceptions raised while the subscriber is processing messages.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.ISubscriber.StartAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Signals the subscriber to start processing incoming messages.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.ISubscriber.StopAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Signals the subscriber to stop processing incoming messages.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Defines the mode used to receive messages from the message bus.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.MessageBusReceiveMode.PeekLock
member.summary: The receiver will hold a lock on the message for a particular duration. If the message is not settled withing this period, it will become available for the next receive operation.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.MessageBusReceiveMode.ReceiveAndDelete
member.summary: The message will be deleted as soon as it is delivered.

member.summary: Defines a system sub-queue from where messages can be received.

member.summary: The dead-letter sub-queue contains messages that have been explicitly dead-lettered.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.MessageBusSubQueue.TransferDeadLetter
member.summary: The transfer dead-letter sub-queue contains messages that have been dead-lettered on transfer (e.g. due to limitations imposed by the message broker).

member.remarks: This identifier can be used to correlate logs and exceptions.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the name of the queue.

member.summary: Defines a queue receiver. A queue receiver is capable of receiving messages from a specific queue in the message bus.

member.summary: Gets the name of the queue.

member.summary: Defines a queue subscriber. A queue subscriber is capable of subscribing to a specific queue in the message bus and process the incoming messages.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.IQueueSubscriber.QueueName
member.summary: Gets the name of the queue.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueOptions
member.summary: Describes the configuration options for a queue.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueOptions.QueueName
member.summary: Gets the queue name.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueOptions.DefaultMessageTimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the default message time to live for messages.
member.remarks: This value applies only to messages that do not have the time to live set. If not set, the default value will be enforced by the message bus service implementation.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueOptions.AutoDeleteOnIdle
member.summary: Gets or sets the time after which the queue will be automatically deleted if idle.
member.remarks: If not set, the default value will be enforced by the message bus service implementation.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueOptions.MaxSizeInMegabytes
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size in megabytes of the memory allocated to the queue. The default value is 1024 MB.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueOptions.RequiresDuplicateDetection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the queue detects duplicate messages. The default value is true.
member.remarks: Messages having the same and sent to the queue within the duration specified by will be considered duplicate and discarded.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueOptions.DuplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration used for duplicate message detection.
member.remarks: If not set, the default value will be enforced by the message bus service implementation.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueOptions.MaxMessageSizeInKilobytes
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum message size in kilobytes.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueOptions.MaxDeliveryCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum delivery count before a message is dead-lettered. The default value is 10.
member.remarks: The delivery count is increased when a message is received in mode and didn't complete the message before the message lock expired.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueOptions.LockDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of a peek lock receive. The amount of time that the message is locked by a given receiver so that no other receiver receives the same message.
member.remarks: If not set, the default value will be enforced by the message bus service implementation.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Queues.QueueOptions.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Describes configuration options for a queue publisher.

member.summary: Gets or sets the receiver identifier.
member.remarks: This identifier can be used to correlate logs and exceptions.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.ReceiverOptions.ReceiveMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the receive mode. The default value is .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.ReceiverOptions.SubQueue
member.summary: Gets or sets the sub-queue from where the receiver should receive messages.
member.remarks: If not set, messages will be received from the queue itself.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.SubscriberOptions
member.summary: Describes configuration options for a subscriber.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.SubscriberOptions.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the subscriber identifier.
member.remarks: This identifier can be used to correlate logs and exceptions.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.SubscriberOptions.ReceiveMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the receive mode. The default value is .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.SubscriberOptions.AutoCompleteMessages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the subscriber should automatically complete messages after the has completed processing. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.SubscriberOptions.MaxAutoLockRenewalDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum duration within which the lock will be renewed automatically.
member.remarks: If not set, the default value will be enforced by the message bus service implementation.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.SubscriberOptions.MaxConcurrentCalls
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent calls to the message handler the subscriber should initiate. The default value is 1.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.SubscriberOptions.SubQueue
member.summary: Gets or sets the sub-queue from where the subscriber should receive messages.
member.remarks: If not set, messages will be received from the queue itself.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.SubscriberOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Defines a correlation filter associated with a topic subscription rule. Correlation filters allow topic subscriptions to accept only the messages that match the filter.
member.remarks: This type also allows storing custom application properties.

member.summary: Gets or sets reply-to address.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.CorrelationSubscriptionRuleFilter.Subject
member.summary: Gets or sets the subject.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the content.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Defines a topic publisher. A topic publisher is capable of publishing and scheduling messages to a specific topic in the message bus.

member.summary: Gets the name of the topic.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.ITopicReceiver
member.summary: Defines a topic receiver. A topic receiver is capable of receiving messages from a specific topic subscription in the message bus.

member.summary: Gets the name of the topic.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.ITopicReceiver.SubscriptionName
member.summary: Gets the name of the subscription.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.ITopicSubscriber
member.summary: Defines a topic subscriber. A topic subscriber is capable of subscribing to a specific topic in the message bus and process the incoming messages.

member.summary: Gets the name of the topic.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.ITopicSubscriber.SubscriptionName
member.summary: Gets the name of the subscription.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionOptions
member.summary: Describes the configuration options for a topic subscription.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionOptions.TopicName
member.summary: Gets the topic name.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionOptions.SubscriptionName
member.summary: Gets the topic subscription name.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionOptions.LockDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration of the receive operation.
member.remarks: This is the amount of time that a message remains locked for a receiver so that no other receiver can receive it. If not set, the default value will be enforced by the message bus service implementation.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionOptions.DefaultMessageTimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the default message time to live for messages. The default value is .
member.remarks: This value applies only to messages that do not have the time to live set. If not set, the default value will be enforced by the message bus service implementation.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionOptions.AutoDeleteOnIdle
member.summary: Gets or sets the time after which the topic subscription will be automatically deleted if idle.
member.remarks: If not set, the default value will be enforced by the message bus service implementation.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionOptions.DeadLetteringOnMessageExpiration
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the topic subscription will support dead-letter when a message expires. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionOptions.EnableDeadLetteringOnFilterEvaluationExceptions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether messages should be dead-lettered when the evaluation of subscription rules fails. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionOptions.MaxDeliveryCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of times a message will be delivered to this topic subscription without being settled before being dead-lettered. The default value is 10.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionOptions.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Describes the configuration options for a topic subscription rule.

member.summary: Gets the topic name.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionRuleOptions.SubscriptionName
member.summary: Gets the topic subscription name.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionRuleOptions.RuleName
member.summary: Gets the topic subscription rule name.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.SubscriptionRuleOptions.DeleteDefaultRule
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the default rule should be deleted if it exists.
member.remarks: When a new topic subscription is created, a default rule (that matches any message) is automatically created.

member.summary: Gets the topic name.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.TopicOptions.DefaultMessageTimeToLive
member.summary: Gets or sets the default message time to live for messages.

member.summary: Gets or sets the time after which the topic will be automatically deleted if idle.
member.remarks: If not set, the default value will be enforced by the message bus service implementation.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.TopicOptions.MaxSizeInMegabytes
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size in megabytes of the memory allocated to the topic. The default value is 1024 MB.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.TopicOptions.RequiresDuplicateDetection
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the topic detects duplicate messages. The default value is true.
member.remarks: Messages having the same and sent to the topic within the duration specified by will be considered duplicate and discarded.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.TopicOptions.DuplicateDetectionHistoryTimeWindow
member.summary: Gets or sets the duration used for duplicate message detection.
member.remarks: If not set, the default value will be enforced by the message bus service implementation.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.TopicOptions.SupportOrdering
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether message order will be maintained. The default value is true.
member.remarks: When true, messages sent to the topic will be forwarded to the each subscription in order.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.Messaging.Topics.TopicOptions.MaxMessageSizeInKilobytes
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum message size in kilobytes.
